definition: to question closely/to investigate in detail/to examine minutely/to get to the heart of the matter
to sculpt/to carve/musical instrument (old)
to chase after/to seek/to do one's utmost to seek or procure sth/to recall
to ask

sentences.english: Examining Wu shows that Lanai is metaphysics.
sentences.chinese: 对“无”的追问表明《老子》是形而上学。

sentences.english: “Well, what is disconnection?” Roberts said again.
sentences.chinese: “好吧，‘断开’到底是什么？”罗伯茨再次追问。

sentences.english: Jupiter, to stop questions, replied that it was a fresh creation from the earth.
sentences.chinese: 朱庇特唯恐她再追问下去就答说这是大地的新造物。

sentences.english: According to Professor Tu, one should first question: what is religion?
sentences.chinese: 杜维明教授表示，这首先需要追问何为宗教？

sentences.english: Zhang mother ask for ten thousand money?
sentences.chinese: 张母追问要一万钱干什么？

sentences.english: Through these questions, Mencius put forward the ultimate basis of goodness.
sentences.chinese: 通过对善的不断追问，孟子为善建构了形上学的根据。

sentences.english: Therefore, We should not keep asking who on earth is my Mr.
sentences.chinese: 所以不要去追问到底谁才是我的Mr。

sentences.english: The second part goes on to question and examine whether this tiger is ever in existence.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分追问和考查老虎是否确然存在。

sentences.english: The husband is cross-examined thereupon no longer.
Eu non-success panic ask what happened, but no answer.
sentences.chinese: 薇芸惊慌追问发生什么事，却得不到答案。

sentences.english: The king of jin ask what gift.
To clamour to win by questioning with a duel truth, again and to win the competition.
sentences.chinese: 至嚣被追问与至嬴决斗的真相，要再与至嬴竞赛。

sentences.english: So, I should not ask who on earth is my Mr.
sentences.chinese: 所以不要去追问到底谁才是我的Mr。

sentences.english: Tana met, ask her why she want to marry western watts.
sentences.chinese: 塔纳碰到帕莱，追问她为什么要嫁给西瓦。

sentences.english: But allowance must be made for those who, without concluding, continue questioning.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须允许那些还没有下结论的人继续追问。

sentences.english: ROBINSON I want to push you one more time on the environment- air.
sentences.chinese: 我想再一次追问环境的问题，即空气这个话题。

definition: to question/to ask/to raise a question
to inquire
to ask (a question) in reply/to answer a question with a question/rhetorical question
to question intensely/to interrogate/to demand information
to question/to ask questions/to inquire/to bring to account/to interrogate
to ask
questioning (a suspect)/interrogation
to reply/to answer/the answer/CL:個|个[ge4]
to conceal/to hide (a taboo subject)/to cover up the truth
to perform an in-depth investigation
to think deeply/to ponder
lit. to examine roots and inquire at the base (idiom); to get to the bottom of sth
to ask about/to make some inquiries/to ask around
explanation/to explain/to interpret/to resolve/CL:個|个[ge4]
to make insinuations/to take an indirect approach (in making inquiries) (idiom)
to dig up roots and inquire at the base (idiom); to get to the bottom of sth
